second: Each game host prepares questions at his discretion, these can be tasks, theoretical questions, etc.
third: The host determines the format for asking questions.
forth: In each game there are N circles (depending on the number of questions), in each of them the participants take turns 'selecting' a question and answering it.
fifth: For each correct answer, the player receives 1 point. For 'half-answer' 0.5 points.
sixth: Bonus: for clarifying questions or additions from any participant, except for the respondent, 0.1 point is required.
